form.title: The best solution to rent a boat
form.subTitle: More than 40,000 boats to rent at the best price and all over the world

owner.title: Owner
owner.paragraph1: Create an ad for free to rent your boat. Sailboats, ribs, boats, catamarans, everyone is welcome at Click&Boat!
owner.paragraph2: Rent to whoever you want, when you want and at the price you see fit. Click&Boat helps you make your boat profitable by allowing you to cover maintenance and use costs.
owner.paragraph3: Optional comprehensive insurance of up to eight million euros of coverage and a secure payment platform for the deposit. Entrust us with the rental of your sailboat, motor boat or catamaran.

lessee.title: Lessee
lessee.paragraph1: Check all the ads through the search engine. Find a boat or sailboat for rent anywhere in Europe and at the best price. Enjoy our insurance included to rent and navigate with total security.
lessee.paragraph2: Get in touch with the owners of the boats for free and ask them about questions related to the boat: availability, equipment, etc. through the built-in messaging service.
lessee.paragraph3: Book directly online with total security and rent the boat or sailboat of your dreams in just a few clicks. You will only be charged if the owner of the boat accepts your rental request. 100% secure payment. Click&Boat is your trusted intermediary.

createBoat.title: Hi, sailor!
createBoat.description: It seems like you want to set your boat up to rent. Well, we will need to know a little bit about it!
